issue.title: [Go] Support Decimal256 type
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10600](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10600). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Decimal with 256 bit precision is now allowed in the spec with a basic implementation in Java and C++.
